HWA_Stats_t Struct Reference
HWA Driver External Data Structures

HWA Statistics from the STATISTICS block. More...

#include <drivers/hwa/hwa.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t maxValue
 
uint16_t maxIndex
 
uint8_t iSumMSB

uint32_t iSumLSB
 
uint32_t qSumLSB
 

Detailed Description

HWA Statistics from the STATISTICS block.

HWA statistics - MAX and SUM - that are output from the statistics block.

Field Documentation

uint32_t HWA_Stats_t::iSumLSB

lower 32 bits of 36-bit value of iSUM; read from ISUMnLSB

uint8_t HWA_Stats_t::iSumMSB

upper 4 bits of 36-bit value of iSUM; read from ISUMnMSB

uint16_t HWA_Stats_t::maxIndex

24 bits value from MAXnINDEX register

uint32_t HWA_Stats_t::maxValue

24 bits value from MAXnVALUE register

uint32_t HWA_Stats_t::qSumLSB

lower 32 bits of 36-bit value of qSUM; read from QSUMnLSB

uint8_t HWA_Stats_t::qSumMSB

upper 4 bits of 36-bit value of qSUM; read from QSUMnMSB
